channel.title: [Help] Donation Infomation [Help]
channel.description:
Hey I have finally finished my forums for my server it has a donate button so now I want to add some donator things to my server here is a list on what I want and if any one can help me.
___Donator List____ Donator Cape - Model & Ints Please Donator Zone/Area - How to do that please Donator Icon - How to do that please
That's all I want to know so please if any one can help me I'll give Rep thank you.

item.title: [Help] Donation Infomation [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

There is a board for this. Look for the Model Requests board. It’s a child of the ‘Models’ board.

-------------EDIT----------------

The donator zone is very easy. You can make a command and make it teleport you to a certain area.
Example:

if(command.startsWith("yourcommand") && (Donator > 1)){ triggerTele(*desired Xcoords*, *desired Ycoords*, *desired height, use 0 if it's ground level*); }

So like this:

if(command.startsWith("DonorArea") && (Donator > 1)){ triggerTele(3374, 2973, 0); }

And as for the icon, there are tutorials on adding Crowns for playerRights, so do the tutorial and instead of playerRights make it for a Donator.

Read full topic
